title.en: From or by Marcel Duchamp or Rrose Sélavy (Box in a Valise)
title.zh-hant: 由馬塞爾‧杜尚或蘿斯‧瑟拉薇呈獻（手提箱裏的盒子）

medium.en: red leather valise (Boîte-en-valise - Series F); cardboard interior lined in red cloth containing 68 miniature replicas and colour reproductions on various media: collotype, relief halftone, screenprint, offset lithograph, photograph with surface coating, printed color and hand coloring on paper, cardboard, clear acetate, vinyl, glass, and ceramic; with an additional set of 12 reproductions of works mounted on loose black folders
medium.zh-hant: 紅色皮質手提箱（手提箱裏的盒子——Ｆ系列)；紅布內襯紙盒，內有68件不同媒材的微縮及彩色複製品：珂羅版印刷本、凸版灰網印刷本、絲網印刷本、柯式平版印刷本、表面塗層照片、彩色印刷及手工上色紙本、紙板、透明醋酸脂薄片、乙烯基、玻璃及陶瓷；外加一套12份裱貼於黑色活頁文件夾的作品複製品
